entities.description: Indicates the level of difficulty a respondent has in participating in social activities over the past 12 months.
Indicates whether emotional problems kept the respondent from social activities over the past 12 months.
Indicates the level of difficulty a respondent has in taking care of household responsibilities over the past 12 months.
Indicates whether emotional problems kept the respondent from household responsibilities over the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Specifies the respondent's level of difficulty in participating in social activities.
Specifies whether the respondent's emotional problems affected their participation in social activities.
Specifies the respondent's level of difficulty in taking care of household responsibilities.
Specifies whether the respondent's emotional problems affected their household responsibilities.
